alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 04 at 9:57PM MST until January 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense freezing fog. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Northern Phillips and Northern Valley Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for sudden changes in visibility. The freezing fog may deposit a thin layer of frost or ice on roadways and other outdoor surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley
